segments.text: I'm looking at this kitchen, and it's quite a scene.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman at the sink is diligently drying a plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can see her movements are precise and focused.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But the water is running from the faucet, filling the basin.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's already pouring over the front edge of the sink, forming a sheet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A growing puddle is spreading across the floor at her feet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: One of her shoes is completely submerged in the water.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Yet, she seems completely unaware of the mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her expression remains utterly neutral, almost peaceful.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: How can someone not notice that much water?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a continuous stream flowing right onto the cabinet doors below.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This is going to cause a lot of water damage.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a sense of dread watching it all unfold.
segments.speaker: PAR
